Scripts.PostClick: ShamanPower:ButtonPostClick(self, button, down); ShamanPower:UpdateButtonOnPostClick(self, button, down);

Scripts.OnClick: if InCombatLockdown() then return end if IsShiftKeyDown() then ShamanPower:StorePreset() else ShamanPower:LoadPreset() end

ShamanPower.opt.freeassign = self:GetChecked(); if ShamanPower.opt.freeassign then ShamanPower:SendMessage("FREEASSIGN YES"); if AllShamans[ShamanPower.player] then AllShamans[ShamanPower.player].freeassign = true end else ShamanPower:SendMessage("FREEASSIGN NO"); if AllShamans[ShamanPower.player] then AllShamans[ShamanPower.player].freeassign = false end end

Scripts.OnLoad: Mixin(self, BackdropTemplateMixin) self:SetBackdrop( { bgFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Background", edgeFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Border", tile = true, tileEdge = true, tileSize = 16, edgeSize = 12, insets = { left = 4, right = 4, top = 4, bottom = 4 } }) self:SetBackdropColor(0.02, 0.02, 0.02, 0.95) self:SetBackdropBorderColor(0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.8)
Scripts.OnHide: if (self.isMoving) then self:StopMovingOrSizing(); self.isMoving = false end local LUIDDM = LibStub("LibUIDropDownMenu-4.0") LUIDDM:CloseDropDownMenus()
